Japji Meditation Day

Posted 06 May 2011

I have attended and lead group sadhana in the past, and during this time recited Japji, but I have not recited Japji everyday. Now after only 4 days into SpiritVoyage’s 40 day Japji sadhana I have found the effects to be numerous.

The hour after I’ve done the Japji meditation, I find my mind starts repeating different parts of this sacred text. A different Pauree will keep repeating in my head and sometimes through out the day. I feel calm and relaxed afterwards. Even though I am calm my brain is working overtime. Thinking about very creative and visionary topics for my personal plans, and how to reach others through the teachings of Kundalini Yoga. I even thought of a workshop to teach while sleeping last night. I have found the last few nights dreams to be intensive. I am working out my fears and anxieties. It can be stressful, but I am lucid dreaming and therefore know why and what is happening. Then I am able to wake up and remember these important messages from me to me.

I have to say that this meditation has a fast and effective way of hitting the mind and soul. I cannot wait to see what else comes up. Japji is helping me in ways I never thought it could do. Wahe-Guru!

About YogiSTRONG

YogiSTRONG is an independent Yoga practice, owned and operated by Gurumantra Kaur (Josephine Fanelli). Based in Potsdam, NY, Gurumantra is the North Country's premier instructor of Kundalini Yoga as taught by Yogi Bajan.
